ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: Snake-Eyes is reunited with a grown-up Sean, who discovers Crimson Guardsmen have occupied his family's old home. The Joes offer to fast-track Sean's admission into their forces. Jinx and Pale Peony investigate Revanche's Dublin division and fight a 921, a robot samurai. Colton takes Duke on a tour of the Pit and shows him a creature with an enormous eye. Alpine, Muskrat and Torpedo attend Dr. Burkhart's funeral.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-11 09:43:42. [CVDB465004] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 10:21:15. [Issue ID 1251431]

ComicInfo.Locations: Dublin,New York City,North America,New York State,Staten Island,San Francisco,Ireland,Ohio,The Pit,California
